artefact.overview: You must get approval form the Scottish Environment Protection Agency to build a damn or weir in Scotland.
artefact.will_continue_on: the Scottish Environment Protection Agency website
artefact.licence_short_description: To use a dam or weir in Scotland you need to get approval from the Scottish Environment Protection Agency (SEPA).
artefact.licence_overview:
To impound water (use a dam or weir) in Scotland, you must get approval from the [Scottish Environment Protection Agency (SEPA).](http://www.sepa.org.uk/ "Scottish Environment Protection Agency"){:rel="external"}

*[SEPA]: Scottish Environment Protection Agency
